Message: The user completes the submission of the form
why is my ad status inactive?

There could be several reasons why your ad status is inactive. It might be due to issues with conversion tracking, typographical errors, or other policy violations. I recommend checking the email from Ad Support for specific details on why your ad was rejected. You can also refer to our article on what to do next if your ad got rejected: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). If you need further assistance, feel free to ask!
it says my ad was approved

If your ad was approved but is still showing as inactive, it might be due to a delay in the system or other technical issues. I recommend checking your account settings and ensuring that all necessary information is correctly filled out. If everything seems correct and the issue persists, please contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
do i need to add Add Ad Credits

Yes, if your ad is approved but not running, it could be due to insufficient ad credits in your account. You need to add ad credits to fund your campaigns. Here's how you can redeem a NewsBreak ad credit: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit). If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

Yes, you can target your ads by state on NewsBreak. We offer interest, demographics, and location-based targeting that allows you to geo-target your ad to specific zip codes, cities, counties, states, or even at the national level. For more details on how to create your first ad and set up targeting, you can check out this article: [How to create your first ad](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17618196971149-How-to-create-your-first-ad).
what timezone is the ad scheduling in

The ad scheduling on NewsBreak is based on the timezone of the user who sets up the ad. This means that if you are setting up your ad from a specific timezone, the scheduling will follow that timezone. If you need more details on ad scheduling and other features, you can refer to this article: [NewsBreak Advertising Cost](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17959734533005-NewsBreak-Advertising-Cost).
